## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator near position (x=0.0, y=12.0)
This structure generates electricity using steam power. It currently appears non-operational due to lack of fuel in boilers and disconnected steam engines.
Consists of the following entities:
-   Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
-   Boiler at position (x=0.0, y=10.5)
-   Boiler at position (x=0.0, y=13.5)
-   Steam Engine at position (x=6.5, y=10.5)
-   Steam Engine at position (x=12.5, y=10.5)
-   Steam Engine at position (x=6.5, y=13.5)
